question: Indian-origin economist and author Lord Meghnad Desai has resigned from a major party in which country, citing racism?
explanation:
Indian-origin economist and author Lord Meghnad Desai has resigned as a member of the UK's Opposition Labour Party, over its failure to tackle racism.
The 80-year-old peer was against the readmission of former party leader Jeremy Corbyn without apology, after being suspended. The Labour Party has been alleged of antisemitism over several years.
